entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
